title: Social Innovation Instructional Design: Critical Learning-Based Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation training for current professionals to analyze social innovation cases and strengthen problem-solving capabilities

learning_goals: Critically analyze social innovation cases and propose alternative approaches.
Design collaborative strategies for solving social issues in simulation/VR environments.
Develop implementation models incorporating diverse stakeholder perspectives when planning social innovation projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
